Clip.Title: FAMILY PORTRAIT IN BLACK AND WHITE
Clip.Episode: Family Portrait in Black and White
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Olga Nenya has 27 children. Four of them, now adults, are her biological children; the other 23 are adopted or foster children. Of those 23, 16 are bi-racial. She calls them "my chocolates," and is raising them to be patriotic Ukrainians.

Clip.Title: ORPHANS OF TIBET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how Tibetan children secretly flee their homeland over the Himalayas to reach schools in India.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Sicily by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: FAMILY PORTRAIT IN BLACK AND WHITE
Clip.Episode: Family Portrait in Black and White
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Olga Nenya has 27 children. Four of them, now adults, are her biological children; the other 23 are adopted or foster children. Of those 23, 16 are bi-racial. She calls them "my chocolates," and is raising them to be patriotic Ukrainians.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Despite threats, Father Daniel Vogt stands with Mexico's native Quechi as they struggle to acquire legal title to their ancestral land.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev John Fife scours the desert giving aid to undocumented migrants crossing into America through the life-endangering Sonora Desert.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The west coast of Newfoundland is a story of cultural history and beauty - from the first European settlements at l'Anse aux Meadows and Port au Choix, to the incredible, scenic beauty of Gros Morne National Park.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey along Nova Scotia's Bay of Fundy coastline is a cultural and geological marvel - from historic Acadian Villages, to world-famous stone formations - rising from the sea.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE

Clip.Title: ORPHANS OF TIBET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how Tibetan children secretly flee their homeland over the Himalayas to reach schools in India.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Smithsonian is the largest museum complex in the world, housing more than 136 million objects. With so many varied things to see, any object may seem out of place, but there's nothing random about it. Host Tom Cavanagh takes a closer look at the seemingly "random" collections.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What does the Smithsonian have to do with food? Join host Tom Cavanagh as he learns to cook Native American dishes with the executive chef of Mitsitam Cafe; experience the American coffee break with the National Museum of American History, and visit the National Museum of Dentistry.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The biggest movie and TV franchise of all time, Star Trek spawned more than 700 TV episodes and twelve films. Creator Gene Roddenberry's vision of the future helped inspire today's scientists to develop the first scientific principles of teleportation, the creation of artificial intelligence, androids, and more.

Clip.Title: FREUD'S NAKED TRUTHS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind-the-scenes of artist Lucian Freud , grandson of Sigmund and see rare footage of him in his studio, where supermodels, gangsters, and British nobility sat for his portraits.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From the Republic of San Marino to Pontecchio Marconi
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the Republic of San Marino to Pontecchio Marconi, see a mosaic of villages, nature and art cities with a background of roaming motors and Verdi's classical symphonies.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Fiorano to Castell'Arquato we continue our journey from Rimini on the Adriatic coast to Ravenna, to admire the beautiful mosaics of the Byzantine Art. See Bologna and its ancient University to Ferrara and its prestigious past linked to the Estensi family.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Thanks to a dramatic repair mission, the Hubble Space Telescope has another chance to capture more stunning pictures like only it can. See how the final tune up came together and what Hubble has learned since.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Gigantic telescopes of the future with multiple mirrors working in unison like the Spitzer Space Telescope, will see further than the Hubble Space Telescope, and possibly get our first pictures ever of another planet that can support life as we know it.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Global Warming: Wine Production, Green Burial & LEED Bldg.)
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: B-2: STEALTH AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The most expensive and specialized airplane ever built, the B-2 Stealth bomber carries a price tag of more than two billion dollars. Highly effective and extremely technically advanced, it has been an integral part of the Air Force arsenal for the past 20 years.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Thanks to a dramatic repair mission, the Hubble Space Telescope has another chance to capture more stunning pictures like only it can. See how the final tune up came together and what Hubble has learned since.
